misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the golf course, brings a unique blend of athleticism and intensity to the Hector Trophée. Representing Helsingin Golfklubi, Olli's imposing stature and rumored wrestling skills have earned him a reputation that precedes him, with few daring to challenge him directly.

Beyond golf, Olli is known to dabble in professional modeling. Despite his success in his side hustle, his true passion lies in golf, as evidenced by his multiple appearances in the Hector Trophée. 2025 will mark Olli's eighth foray into the competition, as he is yet to capture the coveted Hector Trophée, or the individual Victor Trophy.

Olli is actively training, focusing on refining his short game and strategic course management. Olli remains committed to making his mark in the tournament, hoping to leverage his experience and determination to finally seize victory.
